root.name: Pixel Force: Left 4 Dead
root.description: Pixel Force: Left 4 Dead is a 8-bit "demake" of the original Left 4 Dead. The game has the original four campaigns from the game, as well as all four playable characters.NOTE: This game is not actually a part of the Left 4 Dead franchise, as it is a fan-created game. Don't attach it to the franchise page.
